entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
